protein.specific_function: Catalyzes N-terminal palmitoylation of SHH; which is required for SHH signaling. May bind GTP

reference.reference_text: Kawakami Y, Wang X, Shofuda T, Sumimoto H, Tupesis J, Fitzgerald E, Rosenberg S: Isolation of a new melanoma antigen, MART-2, containing a mutated epitope recognized by autologous tumor-infiltrating T lymphocytes. J Immunol. 2001 Feb 15;166(4):2871-7.
